name: Statue Defender
description: Defend the statue from being destroyed by waves of enemies. Choose your class. Level up. Customize your hero. Earn achievements and show the world you are the number one statue defender!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Intel i5, 2.4 Ghz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated HD Graphics 520 w/128 MB or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space
